title: Menu
brief_description: Demonstrates the relationship of sensible food to energy and growth by using a playful litter of pups from the kennel s of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police. Half the litter is fed properly and half on food lacking certain elements; the difference soon becomes apparent. The nutritional value of the foods in a balance diet are explained.
